name: Techno Cop
summary:
A fast-paced first-person shooter in a parkour obstacle course style level. 
The game has a 7 second time limit at the start of a level which increases when enemies are killed. 
The game was designed to be a small project and had been made around the idea of setting high scores and competing over them with friends. 
 
It was teased at some pax events in 2017 by 3D Realms and Slipgate Ironworks, Slipgate Studios at the time, before the project was canceled to work on a similar but larger scale game in Ghostrunner with the company One More Level.
